snippet: The Obama administration should use exports as a component of a broader energy strategy to undercut Russia’s influence over Ukraine.
abstract: Editorial holds proposal by some American lawmakers and energy companies urging United States to export natural gas to Europe to undercut Russia's influence over the Continent is modest move whose effects would not be realized for years; argues natural gas exports should be used as one component of broader energy strategy that will help European nations reduce their dependence on Russian gas.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration should use exports as a component of a broader energy strategy to undercut Russia’s influence over Ukraine.

headline.main: Natural Gas as a Diplomatic Tool
headline.print_headline: Natural Gas as a Diplomatic Tool
